TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pacaycu, title = Pacaycu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacaycu} }

S.FORM: == Pacaycu 巴宰族 == Pacay-cu " Pazeh" singangan naca tu Pace-haycu atu Paycay-haycu, cenday nipangangan u "Sanmaw-hun", u Taywan Tangabulan nu Yuncumin. mueneng i enalan nu Taycun, micidek ku i Anli bansia ku satabakiay. Cence a zidayan layak misatadas tu Cuo Taywa sa, Pacay-cu pacicien mabulaw taydan i Miwli sanyi Liyi-tan nu liwliwan atu Nantuo Puli Aaylan niyadu'an, Puli katukuh ayda mahini henay ku kamu nu Pacay-yi atu lalangawan. 巴宰族(巴宰語:Pazeh) . malawpestu ku kamu nu Pacay-yi 語言瀕危 巴宰語 Pacay-yi misuayaw tu sakalawpesan a kamuan, sadikuday musakamuay tu kamu nu Pacay-yi a tademaw itini i tusep-caysep a mihcaan, nina mabelecay a tademaw ci Pan-cin-yi tatayna, hatidaay tu nu Pacay-cuzen mala layak tu namin, casiw-caysiw a mihcaan ni lecuhan, yu maudip henay napalekal tu " pacay-yi" a kamuan. Tusep-sepcay a mihcaan namipadang ci Pan-cin-yi tu mikinkiway tu cudadan ci Li-zen-kuy yunse tu kamuan, atu Dipun seace ci Seten-ce misulit tu " Pacay-yi zidin", atu niyadu'ay a tademaw ci Wanpan-mei-yi nisangaan nu udip tu adidiay nu zidin " Ama' Atu-nu a Pacayn nakamuan. ". tusep-caysep mihcaan lima a bulad Nantuo Pacay binacadan lalangawan seahuy lisecen ci Pan-wen-hui sakamusa, ayda nu pina a mihcaan nu Pacay-zen itini i nipipadang nu seahu, aydaay a wawa pasubabalaki sabaw tu pina ku matinengay musakamu tu Pacay-yi, cay tu kaw babalaki a cacay ku matinengay musakamu, sasa ayda inai'tu ku sayaway musakamuay nu tademaw. aydaay nu Nantuo Puli Aylan kiwkay tu payduyu nu sananal u kamu nu Pacay-yi ku kamu nida. 2010年5 . kulitan ku bihid 紋面 CInday Cunhua cecum idaw kunipikilukan tu " anli, sawci, wuninlan, alisi, pucay-li tatayna kuliten ku bilbil, adidi' ku nipitulecekan, mahida u Luohan-cetuo, bangcal masasuayaw, i udip aca nu dumaan kuyda" nipicuduh misausi mahida unipikulit nu taluku a lalangawan. adihan nu mita, Keha wucu 參見:噶哈巫族 Pacay binacadan u Taywan tangbulan nu Yencumin, satabakiay nu picidekan nu waywayan han anu masakapah tu kunuheni mitalakw tu Taywan Nandaw a Yencimin, makaala tu cacay a lasubuan a kunhu. Pacay a binacadan idaw henay kunika kenihan tu Pacay-cu " Pazih" atu Keha-wucu " Kaxabu". u niyadu' ku han, Hunyun nutipan u Pacay binacadan, waliyan Wuse u Keha-wu binacadan. " puce-li bansia u Keha-wucu". Pacay-cu-zen mabulaw taydan i Puli, mueneng i Wuniw-lan masaenalay a kitidaan" Aylan kitidaan" u Pacay binacadan, mueneng i Mesi sawacan nu lilisa a Mesi-secun "Niwmin-san, Suocen-hu', Tanan, Wukun-lun" u Keha-wucu. ,約在170cm (Pazih)以及噶哈巫族(Kaxabu). . malecad kina kamu nuheni atu masasengi ku lalangawan, sakamusa ku Yinen-ciaci anikenihan u sakalecad nu binacadan sa. mangalay mikaykic tina Keha-wucu atu Pacay-cu a ngangan, ci Lay-kun-yi buksi mangalay tu Abuan "Abuan" , nina ngangan sapalecaden kina tusaay a binacadan. sadikuday matinengay musakamu tu Pacay-yi a tademaw i tusep-caysep nina mabelecay a Aylan niyaduan ci Pan-cin-yi babalaki, Miesi-secun nina mabelecay ci Pan-cun-nay babalaki a iluc ci Pan-eun-li babalaki atu duma a Keha-wu cenlaw matineng musakamu tu Keha-wuyi, matineng henay mudadiw tu naayaway a Keha-wu a dadadiwan " Yicu-ceke" "ayan, ayin". Abuan "(ayan；愛煙). Keha-wucu itini i Puli ngangan han u " Mei-se-secun-hun" tawyaay a tademaw miduduc tu nadipaan nu babalaki a kawawan. Dipun a zitayan u Yi-yun-cen namin, masasuada tu biyaway a Tay-ya-cu masasudemec. sisa itini i Puli matenes kina kamuan tu " Secun u tada Hun sa". nina binacadan pisiwgacuan pangangan han tu " Huana pisiwgcuan" atu "singanganan tu Pan a nipisiwgacu han" kaliwmaah nu kuyumi tu sabaw cacay a bulad sabaw lima nu demiadan sikawaw. misanga tu dayday a kakanen " Alakuy", sikawaw tu " Centin " mahalit", " dakep tu tabakiay a buting", "cuepiw "maazazuah" tu daydayaca nu kawawan. "阿拉粿",及舉辦"牽田"(mahalit),"抓大魚","走標"(maazazuah)等族群傳統活動.

== Pacayco 巴宰族 == Pacay-co " Pazeh" singangan naca to Pace-hayco ato Paycay-hayco, cenday nipangangan o "Sanmaw-hon", o Taywan Tangabolan no Yoncomin. moeneng i enalan no Taycon, micidek ko i Anli bansia ko satabakiay. Cence a zidayan layak misatadas to Coo Taywa sa, Pacay-co pacicien mabolaw taydan i Miwli sanyi Liyi-tan no liwliwan ato Nantoo Poli Aaylan niyado'an, Poli katokoh ayda mahini henay ko kamo no Pacay-yi ato lalangawan. 巴宰族(巴宰語:Pazeh) . malawpesto ko kamo no Pacay-yi 語言瀕危 巴宰語 Pacay-yi misoayaw to sakalawpesan a kamoan, sadikoday mosakamoay to kamo no Pacay-yi a tademaw itini i tosep-caysep a mihcaan, nina mabelecay a tademaw ci Pan-cin-yi tatayna, hatidaay to no Pacay-cozen mala layak to namin, casiw-caysiw a mihcaan ni lecohan, yo maodip henay napalekal to " pacay-yi" a kamoan. Tosep-sepcay a mihcaan namipadang ci Pan-cin-yi to mikinkiway to codadan ci Li-zen-koy yonse to kamoan, ato Dipon seace ci Seten-ce misolit to " Pacay-yi zidin", ato niyado'ay a tademaw ci Wanpan-mei-yi nisangaan no odip to adidiay no zidin " Ama' Ato-no a Pacayn nakamoan. ". tosep-caysep mihcaan lima a bolad Nantoo Pacay binacadan lalangawan seahoy lisecen ci Pan-wen-hoi sakamosa, ayda no pina a mihcaan no Pacay-zen itini i nipipadang no seaho, aydaay a wawa pasobabalaki sabaw to pina ko matinengay mosakamo to Pacay-yi, cay to kaw babalaki a cacay ko matinengay mosakamo, sasa ayda inai'to ko sayaway mosakamoay no tademaw. aydaay no Nantoo Poli Aylan kiwkay to paydoyo no sananal o kamo no Pacay-yi ko kamo nida. 2010年5 . kolitan ko bihid 紋面 CInday Conhoa cecom idaw konipikilokan to " anli, sawci, woninlan, alisi, pocay-li tatayna koliten ko bilbil, adidi' ko nipitolecekan, mahida o Loohan-cetoo, bangcal masasoayaw, i odip aca no domaan koyda" nipicodoh misaosi mahida onipikolit no taloko a lalangawan. adihan no mita, Keha woco 參見:噶哈巫族 Pacay binacadan o Taywan tangbolan no Yencomin, satabakiay no picidekan no waywayan han ano masakapah to konoheni mitalakw to Taywan Nandaw a Yencimin, makaala to cacay a lasoboan a konho. Pacay a binacadan idaw henay konika kenihan to Pacay-co " Pazih" ato Keha-woco " Kaxabo". o niyado' ko han, Honyon notipan o Pacay binacadan, waliyan Wose o Keha-wo binacadan. " poce-li bansia o Keha-woco". Pacay-co-zen mabolaw taydan i Poli, moeneng i Woniw-lan masaenalay a kitidaan" Aylan kitidaan" o Pacay binacadan, moeneng i Mesi sawacan no lilisa a Mesi-secon "Niwmin-san, Soocen-ho', Tanan, Wokon-lon" o Keha-woco. ,約在170cm (Pazih)以及噶哈巫族(Kaxabo). . malecad kina kamo noheni ato masasengi ko lalangawan, sakamosa ko Yinen-ciaci anikenihan o sakalecad no binacadan sa. mangalay mikaykic tina Keha-woco ato Pacay-co a ngangan, ci Lay-kon-yi boksi mangalay to Aboan "Aboan" , nina ngangan sapalecaden kina tosaay a binacadan. sadikoday matinengay mosakamo to Pacay-yi a tademaw i tosep-caysep nina mabelecay a Aylan niyadoan ci Pan-cin-yi babalaki, Miesi-secon nina mabelecay ci Pan-con-nay babalaki a iloc ci Pan-eon-li babalaki ato doma a Keha-wo cenlaw matineng mosakamo to Keha-woyi, matineng henay modadiw to naayaway a Keha-wo a dadadiwan " Yico-ceke" "ayan, ayin". Aboan "(ayan；愛煙). Keha-woco itini i Poli ngangan han o " Mei-se-secon-hon" tawyaay a tademaw midodoc to nadipaan no babalaki a kawawan. Dipon a zitayan o Yi-yon-cen namin, masasoada to biyaway a Tay-ya-co masasodemec. sisa itini i Poli matenes kina kamoan to " Secon o tada Hon sa". nina binacadan pisiwgacoan pangangan han to " Hoana pisiwgcoan" ato "singanganan to Pan a nipisiwgaco han" kaliwmaah no koyomi to sabaw cacay a bolad sabaw lima no demiadan sikawaw. misanga to dayday a kakanen " Alakoy", sikawaw to " Centin " mahalit", " dakep to tabakiay a boting", "coepiw "maazazoah" to daydayaca no kawawan. "阿拉粿",及舉辦"牽田"(mahalit),"抓大魚","走標"(maazazoah)等族群傳統活動.
